types.name: duration
types.description: The duration of the operation in milliseconds

types.name: serviceType
types.description: The name of the AWS service acted on. These values come from the AWS SDK. To find them in the JAVA SDK search for SERVICE_NAME in each service client.

types.name: reason
types.description: The reason for a metric or exception depending on context

types.name: eventBridgeSchema
types.description: The name of the EventBridge Schema used in the operation

types.name: debug
types.description: If the action was run in debug mode or not

types.name: oldVersion
types.description: The old version of something. Useful when updating dependent resources.

types.name: update
types.description: If the operation was an update or not

types.name: schemaLanguage
types.description: Languages targeted by the schemas service

types.name: workflowToken
types.description: A token used for flow metrics to link calls together

types.name: enabled
types.description: True if turned on, false if turned off

metrics.name: aws_copyArn
metrics.description: Copy the ARN of an AWS resource

metrics.name: aws_deleteResource
metrics.description: Delete an AWS resource

metrics.name: aws_setCredentials
metrics.description: Select a credentials profile

metrics.name: aws_openCredentials
metrics.description: Open the credentials file

metrics.name: aws_createCredentials
metrics.description: Create a new credentials file

metrics.name: aws_validateCredentials
metrics.description: Validate credentials when selecting new credentials

metrics.name: aws_help
metrics.description: Open docs for the extension

metrics.name: aws_helpQuickstart
metrics.description: Open the quickstart guide

metrics.name: aws_showExtensionSource
metrics.description: Open the repo for the extension

metrics.name: aws_refreshExplorer
metrics.description: Refresh the AWS explorer window

metrics.name: aws_reportPluginIssue
metrics.description: Report an issue with the plugin

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_openGroup
metrics.description: Open the CloudWatch Logs group window. ServiceType indicates that it was opened from a different service (like directly from an ECS container)

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_openStream
metrics.description: Open a CloudWatch Logs stream in the window. ServiceType indicates that it was opened from a different service (like directly from an ECS container)

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_downloadStreamToFile
metrics.description: Download a stream to a file on disk. Value indicates the final size of the formatted stream.

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_openStreamInEditor
metrics.description: Download a stream to memory then open in an editor.

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_viewCurrentMessagesInEditor
metrics.description: Copy the currently open (possibly filtered) messages to an editor

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_wrapEvents
metrics.description: Word wrap events off/on

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_tailStream
metrics.description: Tail stream off/on

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_refreshGroup
metrics.description: Refresh group is pressed

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_refreshStream
metrics.description: Refresh stream is pressed

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_searchStream
metrics.description: Called when a stream is searched

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_searchGroup
metrics.description: Called when a group is searched

metrics.name: cloudwatchlogs_showEventsAround
metrics.description: Show event around a time period in ms specified by Value

metrics.name: cloudformation_open
metrics.description: Open a CloudFormation stack in the stack viewer

metrics.name: feedback_result
metrics.description: Called while submitting in-IDE feedback

metrics.name: lambda_delete
metrics.description: called when deleting lambdas remotely

metrics.name: lambda_configure
metrics.description: Called when opening the local configuration of a Lambda to edit

metrics.name: lambda_create
metrics.description: Called when creating lambdas remotely

metrics.name: lambda_goToHandler
metrics.description: Jump to a lambda handler from elsewhere

metrics.name: lambda_editFunction
metrics.description: Called when creating lambdas remotely

metrics.name: lambda_invokeRemote
metrics.description: Called when invoking lambdas remotely

metrics.name: lambda_invokeLocal
metrics.description: Called when invoking lambdas locally (with SAM in most toolkits)

metrics.name: cloudformation_delete
metrics.description: Called when deleting a cloudformation stack

metrics.name: sam_deploy
metrics.description: Called when deploying a sam application

metrics.name: sam_init
metrics.description: Called when initing a sam application

metrics.name: schemas_view
metrics.description: Called when selecting an EventBridge schema to view

metrics.name: schemas_download
metrics.description: Called when downloading an EventBridge schema

metrics.name: schemas_search
metrics.description: Called when searching an EventBridge schema registry

metrics.name: session_start
metrics.description: Called when starting the plugin

metrics.name: session_end
metrics.description: Called when stopping the IDE on a best effort basis

metrics.name: s3_copyBucketName
metrics.description: Copy the bucket name to the clipboard

metrics.name: s3_copyPath
metrics.description: Copy the path of a S3 object to the clipboard

metrics.name: s3_createBucket
metrics.description: Create a S3 bucket

metrics.name: s3_deleteBucket
metrics.description: Delete a S3 bucket

metrics.name: s3_deleteObject
metrics.description: Delete a single S3 object

metrics.name: s3_downloadObject
metrics.description: Download a single S3 object

metrics.name: s3_downloadObjects
metrics.description: Download multiple S3 objects

metrics.name: s3_uploadObject
metrics.description: Upload a single S3 object

metrics.name: s3_renameObject
metrics.description: Rename a single S3 object

metrics.name: s3_uploadObjects
metrics.description: Upload multiple S3 objects

metrics.name: s3_openEditor
metrics.description: Open a view of a S3 bucket
